title: CES Energy Solutions Corp. (CESDF) Q2 2025 Earnings Call Transcript
description: CES Energy Solutions Corp. (OTCPK:CESDF) Q2 2025 Earnings Conference Call August 8, 2025 11:00 AM ETCompany ParticipantsAnthony Michael Aulicino - Executive...
content:
Good day, and welcome to the CES Energy Solutions Second Quarter 2025 Results Conference Call and Webcast. [Operator Instructions] The conference is being recorded.

[Operator Instructions] I would now like to turn the conference over to Tony Aulicino, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer. Please go ahead, sir.

Good morning, everyone, and thank you for attending today's call. I'd like to note that in our commentary today, there will be forward- looking financial information and that our actual results may differ materially from the expected results due to various risk factors and assumptions. These risk factors and assumptions are summarized in our second quarter MD&A and press release dated August 7, 2025, and in our annual information form dated March 6, 2025. In addition, certain financial measures that we will refer to today are not recognized under current general accepted accounting policies. And for a description and definition of these, please see our second quarter MD&A.

At this time, I'd like to turn the call over to Ken Zinger, our President and CEO.

Thank you, Tony, and welcome, everyone, and thank you for joining us on the second quarter 2025 earnings call. On today's call, I will provide a brief summary of our financial results released yesterday, followed by an update on capital allocation and then our divisional updates for Canada and the U.S., as well as our outlook for the remainder of 2025. I will then pass the call over to Tony, to provide a detailed
summary: CESDF's Q2 2025 earnings call will be conducted by Tony Aulicino, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer, and will be discussing the company's financial results and outlook for 2025. The company's actual results may differ from expected results due to various risk factors and assumptions, including that certain financial measures that we will use are not recognized under current general accepted accounting policies. Ken Zinger, our President and CEO, will provide a brief summary of our financial results, an update on capital allocation, and then provide a detailed outlook for the remainder of 2025.
shortSummary: CESDF's Q2 2025 results call will include forward-looking financial information, risks factors, and a detailed outlook for the remainder of 2025.
argos_summary: CES Energy Solutions held its Second Quarter 2025 Results Conference Call, where executives discussed financial results, capital allocation, and divisional updates for Canada and the U.S. The call included forward-looking statements and emphasized that actual results may differ due to various risk factors. Detailed financial measures not recognized under GAAP were also mentioned, with references to the company's MD&A and press release for further information.
